title: Свои
overview: "Svoi" is a team of the best experts from different structures who have joined together to solve the most non—trivial detective mysteries. A forensic scientist, a criminologist, an investigator, a programmer, a psychologist and even a psychic! Each of them has their own character, their own weaknesses and, of course, their own superpowers. But at the same time, like any of us, they are ordinary living people. They are "Svoi".
